title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 106.6 - Pickup truck
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 106.6 - Pickup truck

State Regulations
A truck with a cargo bed and side walls, regardless of
seating capacity within the cab. A pickup truck will receive a commercial registration
except a pickup truck which is used exclusively for non-commercial purposes and
with no business advertising may receive a passenger registration, at the
registrant's option. This subdivision shall also apply to pickup trucks that
are leased and rented, provided that the lessee or renter of the pickup truck
certifies on a form, provided by the leasing or rental company, that the pickup
truck shall be used exclusively for noncommercial purposes. No rental or
leasing company shall permit the renting or leasing of a pickup truck if the
renter or lessee fails to complete the certification required by this
subdivision or if such company knows or has reason to know that the renter or
lessee is operating a pickup truck for commercial purposes. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
